statements: SELECT * FROM patient_monitoring WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_monitoring WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_date FROM patient_monitoring WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_monitoring ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_id FROM patient_monitoring WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_monitoring WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_monitoring WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM patient_monitoring WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_date FROM patient_monitoring WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY treatment_date;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, treatment_id FROM patient_monitoring WHERE treatment_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT patient_id, name, age, admission_date FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female' AND age < 30
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_type, treatment_date FROM Treatments ORDER BY treatment_date
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, admission_date FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT Patients.name, Treatments.treatment_type, Treatments.treatment_date FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id;
SELECT name, age, admission_date, treatment_type FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE Treatments.effectiveness_score > 0.8;
SELECT DISTINCT gender, COUNT(*) as patient_count FROM Patients GROUP BY gender HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5 ORDER BY patient_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patient WHERE age > 30;
SELECT treatment_name, dosage, frequency FROM Treatment WHERE dosage >= 50;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, outcome_description FROM Patient JOIN Outcome ON Patient.patient_id = Outcome.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Outcome ORDER BY outcome_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patient INNER JOIN Outcome ON Patient.patient_id = Outcome.patient_id WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, admission_date FROM Patient WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT Patient.patient_id, Patient.patient_name, Outcome.outcome_description FROM Patient LEFT JOIN Outcome ON Patient.patient_id = Outcome.patient_id WHERE Outcome.outcome_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT Treatment.treatment_name, COUNT(Outcome.outcome_id) AS outcome_count FROM Treatment INNER JOIN Outcome ON Treatment.treatment_id = Outcome.treatment_id GROUP BY Treatment.treatment_name;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, start_date FROM Patient, Treatment, Outcome WHERE Patient.patient_id = Outcome.patient_id AND Treatment.treatment_id = Outcome.treatment_id ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 40;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19';
SELECT * FROM Treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT staff_name, specialization FROM MedicalStaff WHERE department = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, description, cost FROM Patients JOIN PatientHistory ON Patients.patient_id = PatientHistory.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON PatientHistory.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id WHERE outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT staff_name, specialization, department FROM MedicalStaff ORDER BY staff_name;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_name, PatientHistory.treatment_date, PatientHistory.outcome FROM Patients JOIN PatientHistory ON Patients.patient_id = PatientHistory.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON PatientHistory.treatment_id = Treatments.treatment_id WHERE Patients.age < 30 ORDER BY PatientHistory.treatment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT patient_id, outcome_score, outcome_date FROM Outcomes WHERE outcome_score > 80;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, hospital FROM Doctors WHERE specialization='Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_name, Outcomes.outcome_score FROM Patients INNER JOIN Outcomes ON Patients.patient_id = Outcomes.patient_id INNER JOIN Treatments ON Treatments.treatment_id = Outcomes.treatment_id;
SELECT doctor_name, hospital, COUNT(*) AS patient_count FROM Doctors INNER JOIN Outcomes ON Doctors.doctor_id = Outcomes.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name, hospital;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Treatments.treatment_name, Outcomes.outcome_score FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Outcomes ON Patients.patient_id = Outcomes.patient_id LEFT JOIN Treatments ON Treatments.treatment_id = Outcomes.treatment_id WHERE Outcomes.outcome_score > 5;
